TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersistenceParticipant extends System.Object

summary.span: 這個類別允許 和 參與持續性處理程序。

span.span: This class allows both and to participate in persistence process.

summary.span: 持續性參與者衍生自 類別或 類別 ( 類別的衍生類別)、實作抽象方法，然後加入類別的執行個體做為工作流程執行個體擴充。

span.span: A persistence participant derives from the class or the class (derived class of the class), implements abstract methods, and then add an instance of the class as a workflow instance extension.

summary.span: 和 保存執行個體時，會尋找此類擴充，並且在適當的時間叫用適當的方法。

span.span: The and look for such extensions when persisting an instance and invoke appropriate methods at appropriate times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機保存執行個體時，會執行下列步驟 (或階段)：A host executes the following steps (or stages) when persisting an instance: 1. 收集要保存的值。Collects values to be persisted. 2. 對應整體結構值的欄位與個別值。Maps fields of monolithic structured values to individual values. 3. 核發 給持續性提供者。Issues the to the persistence provider. 4. 在持續性異動下執行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 主機會先結束一個階段再開始進行下一個階段。A host completes a stage before beginning the next stage. 例如，在進行保存時，主機會先從所有持續性參與者收集值，再進入第二個階段。For example when persisting, the host collects values from all the persistence participants before moving to the second stage. 在第二個階段中，主機會將在第一個階段中收集到的所有值提供給第二個階段中的所有持續性參與者，以進行對應。In the second stage, the host provides all the values collected in the first stage to all persistence participants in the second stage for mapping. 在第三個階段中，主機叫用 時，會將在第一及第二個階段中收集到的所有值提供給持續性提供者。In the third stage, the host provides all the collected values in the first and second stages to the persistence provider when invoking the . 接著，在第四個階段中，主機會將收集到的所有值提供給持續性異動下的所有持續性 IO 參與者。Then in the fourth stage, the host provides all the collected values to all the persistence IO participants under the persistence transaction. 主機載入持續性執行個體時，會執行下列階段：A host executes the following stages when loading a persistence instance: 1. 核發 和 給持續性提供者。Issues the and to the persistence provider. 2. 在持續性異動下執行 I/O。Performs I/O under the persistence transaction. 3. 發行已載入的值。Publishes the loaded values. 在最高層級時，衍生自 類別的工作流程執行個體擴充可以參與持續性處理序的第一個 (收集) 和第二個 (對應) 階段，以及載入處理序的第三個 (發行) 階段。At the highest level, workflow instance extensions that derive from the class can participate in the first (Collect) and second (Map) stages of persisting process and the third stage (Publish) of loading process. 衍生自 PersistenceIOParticipant 類別的工作流程執行個體擴充還可以參與持續性處理序的第四個階段和載入處理序的第二個階段 (I/O)。Workflow instance extensions deriving from the PersistenceIOParticipant class can additionally participate in the fourth stage of the persisting process and the second stage of the loading process (I/O). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立衍生自 的類別。The following code sample demonstrates creating a class that derives from . 這個範例取自[招聘程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/hiring-process.md)範例。This example is from the [Hiring Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/hiring-process.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_HiringRequestProcess#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_hiringrequestprocess/cs/hiringrequestpersistenceparticipant.cs#1)]

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollectValues([out] class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, object>& readWriteValues, [out] class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, object>& writeOnlyValues) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub CollectValues (ByRef readWriteValues As IDictionary(Of XName, Object), ByRef writeOnlyValues As IDictionary(Of XName, Object))

protected: virtual void CollectValues([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ % readWriteValues, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ % writeOnlyValues);
abstract member CollectValues : * -> unit override this.CollectValues : * -> unit

span.span: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.

summary.span: 主機會在自訂的持續性參與者上叫用這個方法，以收集要保存的讀寫值和唯寫值。

span.span: A host invokes this method on a custom persistence participant to collect read-write values and write-only values, to be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主機會將第一個字典中的讀寫值封裝為 集合的 物件，並將第二個字典中的唯寫值封裝為 物件，並且設定 和 旗標集。The host packages read-write values in the first dictionary as objects of an collection, and packages write-only values in the second dictionary as objects with and flags set. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 在同一個持續性時段中，透過跨所有持續性參與者實作 而提供的每個值都必須擁有唯一的 XName。Each value provided by implementations of across all persistence participants within one persistence episode must have a unique XName. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在衍生自 的類別中使用 CollectValues。The following code sample demonstrates using CollectValues in a class that derives from . 這個範例取自[持續性參與者](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md)範例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PersistenceParticipants#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_persistenceparticipants/cs/stepcountextension.cs#2)]

Protected Overridable Function MapValues (readWriteValues As IDictionary(Of XName, Object), writeOnlyValues As IDictionary(Of XName, Object)) As IDictionary(Of XName, Object)

protected: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ MapValues(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ readWriteValues, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Object ^> ^ writeOnlyValues);

abstract member MapValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> override this.MapValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> * System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj>

span.span: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.

summary.span: 主機在第一個階段中完成收集值時，會叫用這個方法。

span.span: A host invokes this method after it is done with collecting the values in the first stage.

summary.span: 主機會將在第一個階段 (CollectValues 階段) 中自所有持續性參與者收集到的值所組成的兩個唯讀字典轉送到這個方法，以進行對應。

span.span: The host forwards two read-only dictionaries of values it collected from all persistence participants during the first stage (CollectValues stage) to this method for mapping.

summary.span: 主機會將這個方法所傳回之字典中的值加入到唯寫值的集合中。

span.span: The host adds values in the dictionary returned by this method to the collection of write-only values.

returns.span: 字典，其中包含要保存的其他唯寫值。

span.span: A dictionary containing additional write-only values to be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過跨所有持續性參與者實作 方法所提供的每個值，包括在第一個階段收集到的所有值 (CollectValues stage)，都必須有唯一的 XName。Each value provided by implementations of all the methods across all persistence participants including all the values collected in the first stage (CollectValues stage) must have a unique XName. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在衍生自 的類別中使用 MapValues。The following code sample demonstrates using MapValues in a class that derives from . 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PurchaseProcess#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_purchaseprocess/cs/xmlpersistenceparticipant.cs#2)]

abstract member PublishValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> unit override this.PublishValues : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName, obj> -> unit

param.name: readWriteValues
param.span: 從持續性存放區載入的讀寫值。

span.span: The read-write values that were loaded from the persistence store.

param.span: 這個字典對應於保存在最新持續性時段中的讀寫值字典。

span.span: This dictionary corresponds to the dictionary of read-write values persisted in the most recent persistence episode.

summary.span: 主機會叫用這個方法，並將 集合 (由 或 填入) 中載入的所有值當做字典參數傳遞。

span.span: The host invokes this method and passes all the loaded values in the collection (filled by the or ) as a dictionary parameter.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在衍生自 的類別中使用 PublishValues。The following code sample demonstrates using PublishValues in a class that derives from . 這個範例取自[持續性參與者](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md)範例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md) sample.
